text: A ke maina a ba ba lesome le bobedi ba o ba tlhophileng: Simone (yo o neng a mmitsa Petere) Jakobe le Johane (bomorwa Sebede, Jesu a ba bitsa barwa Tumo ya Maru). Anterea, Filipo, Baretholomea, Mathaio, Thomase, Jakobe, (Morwa Alefaio) Thadaeo, Simone (yo o neng e le wa leloko la lekgotla la dipolotiki le le neng le ikemiseditse go menola puso ya Roma.) Judase Isekariota, (yo e leng ene yo o mo okileng).
